SEARCH
程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.item

接口 AttributeProperty

@NonExtendable public interface AttributeProperty
Item attribute storage container interface, used to manage item initial attributes.

All attributes will be written to the internal PersistentDataContainer data container when the item's [ItemStack](file://org\bukkit\inventory\ItemStack.java#L37-L170) is created

另请参阅:
  • empty()

  • 方法详细资料

    • empty

      @NotNull static @NotNull AttributeProperty empty()
      Gets a new custom item attribute configuration instance.
      返回:
      a new custom item attribute configuration instance

    • addAttribute

      <P, C> AttributeProperty addAttribute(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey key, @NotNull @NotNull PersistentDataType<P,C> type, @NotNull C value)
      Adds an attribute.
      参数:
      key - attribute identifier (cannot be null)
      type - attribute type (cannot be null)
      value - attribute value (cannot be null)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if parameters are null or value type is invalid

    • hasAttribute

      boolean hasAttribute(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey key)
      Checks if a specified attribute exists.
      参数:
      key - the attribute identifier to check
      返回:
      true if the attribute exists

    • getAttribute

      @NotNull <T> T getAttribute(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey key, @NotNull @NotNull Class<T> type)
      Gets a global attribute value.
      类型参数:
      T - return value type
      参数:
      key - attribute identifier (cannot be null)
      type - attribute type (cannot be null)
      返回:
      the stored attribute value (never null)
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the attribute does not exist or type does not match

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the current container is an empty configuration.
      返回:
      true if no attributes (global/item) are set

    • getAttributeKeys

      @NotNull @Unmodifiable @NotNull Collection<NamespacedKey> getAttributeKeys()
      Gets all registered attribute `NamespacedKey`s.
      返回:
      list of item attribute keys

    • setPersistenceDataContainer

      void setPersistenceDataContainer(@NotNull @NotNull PersistentDataContainer persistenceDataContainer)
      write this attribute property into the provided persistence data container
      参数:
      persistenceDataContainer - the persistence data container (cannot be null)
